name: Anno Mitsumasa Pepperon-mura no Shiki
summary: Based on Mitsumasa Anno's picture books, the game takes place in an old-fashioned German village. There are some some city building simulation and management elements, throughout four seasons. Each building has its own activities and learning material such as the bakery, carpenter and clothes shop. There is also a segment in which you can custom build your own village.
